title: Iconic Bird of American Horror Stories Faces Its Own Terrifying Fate
excerpt: The Whip-Poor-Willâ€™s shrill, death-proclaiming song populates the works of Stephen King and H.P. Lovecraft. But the bird itself has fallen on hard times. Could it become a ghost of Halloweens past?

title: In Defense of the Rat
excerpt: Rats are less pestilent and more lovable than we think. Can we learn to live with them?

title: A Mystery That Took 13,200 Years to Crack
excerpt: Hidden in the tusk of a 34-year-old mastodon was a record of time and space that helped explain his violent death.
